channel.title: Confusing Exhume Results
channel.description:
#### What happened? Exhuming the starting Assassin's kill after he becomes Mastermind informs the Physician that they were killed by a "Mastermind" in white text.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Exhume should say they were killed by "Assassin" in purple text.
#### Steps to reproduce: Exhume a dead player who was killed by the starting assassin, after that assassin turned into Mastermind.

item.title: Confusing Exhume Results
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
If this isn’t fixed I just thought of the best strategy omg

Please don’t fix, gimme free wins

item.title: Confusing Exhume Results
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
What happened?

Exhuming the starting Assassin’s kill after he becomes Mastermind informs the Physician that they were killed by a “Mastermind” in white text.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Exhume should say they were killed by “Assassin” in purple text.

Steps to reproduce:

Exhume a dead player who was killed by the starting assassin, after that assassin turned into Mastermind.

Read full topic
